issue.title: [CF 32] Rip, Rake and Savage Roar not displaying
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Adding Rip, Rake and Savage Roar in the same way I did pre-patch(debuff, on target(for the bleeds, for the Roar its buff, player), when present, show timer, only if cast by self)
2.
3.

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?
Expected output: seeing the 2 bleeds and the Roar when they're on the target/me with a timer
Output: Nothing

What version of the product are you using?
Curse Client and WoWmatrix say TellMeWhen 1.5.3, so I guess thats it

Do you have an error log of what happened?
Nope, doesn't show any error. The built-in "bleed damage increase" thing works perfectly fine, but these 3 don't.

Please provide any additional information below.


> Posted by CurseForge user fly835 | Imported from CurseForge issue #32 | Raw

comments.body:
I may have messed up the alpha settings when you upgrade to 1.5.3. Check this and let me know if it still doesnt work.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Yup, the alpha was set to not display them when present. Gonna download the new version now :P


> Posted by CurseForge user fly835
